anathema: Purposefully spread illness, destroy nature, abandon the wounded or dying
edict: Provide aid to the sick and wounded, grow or tend plants with healing properties, comfort the dying
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Immonhiel (Balm-Bringer)](/Deities.aspx?ID=626)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 4

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Provide aid to the sick and wounded, grow or tend plants with healing properties, comfort the dying

**Anathema** Purposefully spread illness, destroy nature, abandon the wounded or dying

**Area of Concern**
Herbs, medicine, plants, solace

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42)

**Favored Weapon** [Hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=382)

**Domains** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=116)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=1678)

- **3rd**
[Cozy Cabin](/Spells.aspx?ID=1474)

- **5th**
[Plant Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1637)

</column>
